turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good morning. Coffee please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, of course. What kind of coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Starbucks, of course.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK. What Starbucks would you like to pick your coffee up at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one in Blaine, MN.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Fine. Is that the Starbucks at 1384 109th Avenue in Blaine, MN?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's the one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. What would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hmmm, how about a latte?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of latte would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, good question. How about a mocha latte?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you mean the iced caffe mocha?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's the one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: All right. Would you like any additions to it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A shot of caramel would be good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else in your latte?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you care for any other beverage or food?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size latte would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Make it a grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK. One grande iced caffe latte.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your bill comes to $5.12.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Does that include the tax?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, it does.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: OK. We're good, I'll pick it up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you for using your personal assistant. Have a nice day.
